name: blog-con-react-y-vite
description: Un blog moderno y completo construido con React 19, Vite, Bootstrap 5 y un backend Express.js con MySQL

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frondend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.security:audit: npm audit && cd frondend && npm audit && cd ../backend && npm audit
scripts.security:daily: npm run security:check && npm run security:audit
scripts.security:audit-fix: npm audit fix && cd frondend && npm audit fix && cd ../backend && npm audit fix
scripts.security:check-updates: npm outdated && cd frondend && npm outdated && cd ../backend && npm outdated
scripts.security:verify-lockfiles: npm ls && cd frondend && npm ls && cd ../backend && npm ls

author: charlyanimado
